Package model

Class AbstractStockModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.AbstractStockModel
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    StockModel
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BetterStockModelImpl, SimpleStockModel
    public abstract class AbstractStockModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements StockModel
    The AbstractStockModel takes all the functionality that is shared between the SimpleStockModel and BetterStockModelImpl, as the only difference between the results of each portfolio is the exact functionality behind the Portfolio objects based into the portfolios saved. (See the differences between BetterPortfolioImpl and SimplePortfolio for more in-depth understanding.)

        Description copied from interface: StockModel

        Specified by:

        Parameters:
